biography: Rasmus, a familiar name from the Vihti Golf Club, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While he has graced the greens of the Hector Troph√©e on one occasion, his presence has always been marked by a deep respect for the traditions of the sport.

Though Rasmus is considered retired from Hector events, his contributions to the camaraderie and competitive spirit of the tournament are fondly remembered. Whether he'll make a surprise return to the field remains to be seen, but his legacy as a sportsman is secure.
